get_started_message: To get started, we need to know how you'll be using stuwin.ai. Pick the workspace type that fits your needs.
student_desc: Join classes, access learning materials, and track your academic progress.
parent_desc: Monitor your child's progress and stay connected with their school.
tutor_desc: Offer private lessons and manage your students independently.
provider_desc: Register your organization to manage educational content and students.
staff_access_notice: Staff access is assigned by administration strictly.
